sentence.Network_cn: 横置你所操控的一个未横置的沼泽: 百牲祭对目标生物或玩家造成1点伤害.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: via Latin from Greek hekatombē (from hekaton 'hundred' + bous 'ox')

means.word_mean: 1. a great sacrifice; an ancient Greek or Roman sacrifice of 100 oxen
